channel.title: Projects on My Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on My Data Science

item.title: Box Office Revenue Projections
item.description: This project uses movie data scraped from The Numbers website to project box office revenue. Random forest is the method used to predict box office revenue. R Code Python Code

item.title: Ozone Levels
item.description: O3 is the main component of smog. CMAQ is a method to estimate the O3 levels in an area. This study explores the relationship between CMAQ measurements and O3 levels. We also construct a statistical model that deals with the spatial correlation between CMAQ values at different locations. R Code Python Code

item.title: Solar AR(1)
item.description: Times series data collected from solar panels was used to estimate how much money could be saved using solar energy. R Code Python Code
